name: New Generation Health Center - Reproductive Health Services
description: Reproductive Health Clinic: Department of Public Health youth clinic in partnership with Homeless Prenatal Program serving young people, ages 12-24. Services include: Birth control counseling and dispersing, STD testing, Pregnancy testing and counseling, HIV testing and counseling, Pap smears, Pelvic exams Appointment times are: Monday 9am-5 p.m.: In-person and telehealth Tuesday 10-6 p.m.: In-person and telehealth Wednesday 9-5 p.m: In-person and telehealth (CLOSED 1-5PM EVERY SECOND WEDNESDAY
